# <code>arg-max</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Return index for max value in series</div>

## Signature

```> arg-max```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Returns index for max value
```shell
  > [1 3 2] | into df | arg-max
```
